page.title: 15LINFORD FESTIVAL M. KEYNES
page.content: Linford Festival happens once a year. It is a time when the people of Great Linford get together for some fun. The Festival takes place in Great Linford village. It always has a theme. This year the theme was an English country weekend. Children from Grt. Linford Combined School had a fancy dress parade on Friday 5th July 1985 to begin the festival. They dressed as nursery rhyme characters. The festival began with a cabaret in the ballroom of Linford Manor on Friday evening, it had a 20's theme. On Saturday people gathered on the village green and paraded down the High Street. There were lots of stalls, crafts, jewelry, cakes,and toys were sold. A tombola stall raised Â£160 for the school.On Saturday evening there was a concert in the church and a special open air service outside the manor on Sunday.
